about.description:
Software package and libraries for sequential and parallel
graph partitioning, static mapping and clustering, sequential
mesh and hypergraph partitioning, and sequential and parallel
sparse matrix block ordering.
about.summary: SCOTCH: Static Mapping, Graph, Mesh and Hypergraph Partitioning, and Parallel and Sequential Sparse Matrix Ordering Package

name: scotch
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: scotch
    version: 6.0.9
source:
    fn: scotch-6.0.9.tar.gz
    patches:
        - debian-dynamic.patch
        - patch1.diff
    sha256: 622b4143cf01c480bb15708b3651b29c25e4aeb00c8c6447ff196aca2eca5c93
    url: https://gforge.inria.fr/frs/download.php/latestfile/298/scotch_6.0.9.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1
    run_exports:
        - scotch >=6.0.9,<6.0.10.0a0
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build.sh
    string: h0eec0ba_1
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_0
        - binutils_linux-64 2.34 hc952b39_18
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.3.0 hd420e75_5
        - gcc_linux-64 7.3.0 h553295d_18
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_0
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - mpi 1.0 mpich
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - bison 3.4 he1b5a44_1
        - flex 2.6.4 he1b5a44_1004
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - m4 1.4.18 h14c3975_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.3.0
        - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
        - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotch${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotch-6${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotcherr${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotcherr-6${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotcherrexit${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotcherrexit-6${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotchmetis${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libscotchmetis-6${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libesmumps${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libesmumps-6${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/scotch.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/scotchf.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/esmumps.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/scotch/metis.h"
        - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/include/metis.h"
    files:
        - Makefile.inc
    requires:
        - gcc_linux-64 7.*
    source_files:
        - src/check
        - src/libscotch/common.h
        - src/libscotch/fibo.h
        - src/libscotch/module.h
about:
    description: 'Software package and libraries for sequential and parallel

        graph partitioning, static mapping and clustering, sequential

        mesh and hypergraph partitioning, and sequential and parallel

        sparse matrix block ordering.

        '
    doc_url: http://gforge.inria.fr/docman/?group_id=248&dirid=326
    home: https://www.labri.fr/perso/pelegrin/scotch/
    license: CECILL-C
    license_file: doc/CeCILL-C_V1-en.txt
    summary: 'SCOTCH: Static Mapping, Graph, Mesh and Hypergraph Partitioning, and
        Parallel and Sequential Sparse Matrix Ordering Package'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - davidbrochart
        - minrk

Software package and libraries for sequential and parallel
graph partitioning, static mapping and clustering, sequential
mesh and hypergraph partitioning, and sequential and parallel
